Diez, D.M., Barr, C.D., & Çetinkaya-Rundel, M. (2019). *OpenIntro Statistics (4th Ed).* 

> This is an open source textbook and can be downloaded in PDF format [here](resources/OpenIntroStatistics.pdf), from the [OpenIntro](http://www.openintro.org/stat/textbook.php) website, or a printed copy can be ordered from [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/OpenIntro-Statistics-Fourth-David-Diez/dp/1943450072/ref=sr_1_2?keywords=openintro&qid=1563548071&s=gateway&sr=8-2).
